entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Victoria (Hartland)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa steady
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
